{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Domestic Home Assistant",
  "description": "Karis Concept is a full-time Hospitality Recruitment company. We recruit and train staff to offer professional services in the hospitality industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Domestic Home Assistant

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time.

Job Summary


	Clean and organize all living areas.
	Laundry and ironing
	Shop for groceries, and prepare simple meals or assist with meal prep.
	Run errands like grocery shopping, picking up prescriptions, or dropping off dry cleaning.
	Report and coordinate necessary home repairs.
	Provide assistance with childcare or pet care as required.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;karisconcept@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",
  "datePosted": "2025-10-11",
  "validThrough": "2025-10-27",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Karis Concept"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Abuja",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "188685"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 0,
      "maxValue": 0,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Domestic Home Assistant Job at Karis Concept




        
    

        
        Karis Concept is a full-time Hospitality Recruitment company. We recruit and train staff to offer professional services in the hospitality industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Domestic Home Assistant

Job Location: Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time.

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Clean and organize all living areas.
	Laundry and ironing
	Shop for groceries, and prepare simple meals or assist with meal prep.
	Run errands like grocery shopping, picking up prescriptions, or dropping off dry cleaning.
	Report and coordinate necessary home repairs.
	Provide assistance with childcare or pet care as required.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: karisconcept@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Legal Manager",
  "description": "Ganfeng Lithium Industry Limited is a mining company engaged in the exploration, mining, and processing of lithium. With a strong presence across the country, the company operates branches in Lagos, Abuja, and Nasarawa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Legal Manager

Job Locations:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT) and Nasarawa
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Lawyer with 3 to 7 years post-call experience to join our team.
	The successful candidate will provide legal advice, ensure compliance with mining and corporate regulations, handle contractual agreements, and represent the company&rsquo;s interests in all legal matters.


Key Responsibilities


	Draft, review, and negotiate contracts, agreements, and other legal documents.
	Provide legal advice on company operations, transactions, and compliance matters.
	Ensure adherence to mining laws, labor laws, corporate governance, and regulatory requirements.
	Represent the company in court proceedings, arbitrations, and mediations when necessary.
	Conduct legal research and keep the company updated on relevant changes in laws and regulations.
	Liaise with government agencies, regulators, and external counsel.
	Handle dispute resolution and risk management strategies.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Law (LL.B) and a Barrister-at-Law (B.L) qualification.
	Minimum of 3 years and maximum of 7 years post-call experience.
	Strong knowledge of corporate/commercial law, mining law, and regulatory compliance.
	Excellent drafting, negotiation, and communication skills.
	Proven ability to work independently and manage multiple priorities.
	High level of integrity, professionalism, and attention to detail.


What We Offer


	Competitive remuneration package.
	Opportunities for professional growth and development.
	A dynamic and supportive work environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qandidates candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter&nbsp;to:&nbsp;ganfenglithiumindustrylimited1@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",
  "datePosted": "2025-10-11",
  "validThrough": "2025-10-16",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Ganfeng Lithium Industry Limited"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",

      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {

  },

Legal Manager Job at Ganfeng Lithium Industry Limited




        
    

        
        Ganfeng Lithium Industry Limited is a mining company engaged in the exploration, mining, and processing of lithium. With a strong presence across the country, the company operates branches in Lagos, Abuja, and Nasarawa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Legal Manager

Job Locations: Abuja (FCT) and Nasarawa
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Lawyer with 3 to 7 years post-call experience to join our team.
	The successful candidate will provide legal advice, ensure compliance with mining and corporate regulations, handle contractual agreements, and represent the company’s interests in all legal matters.


Key Responsibilities


	Draft, review, and negotiate contracts, agreements, and other legal documents.
	Provide legal advice on company operations, transactions, and compliance matters.
	Ensure adherence to mining laws, labor laws, corporate governance, and regulatory requirements.
	Represent the company in court proceedings, arbitrations, and mediations when necessary.
	Conduct legal research and keep the company updated on relevant changes in laws and regulations.
	Liaise with government agencies, regulators, and external counsel.
	Handle dispute resolution and risk management strategies.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Law (LL.B) and a Barrister-at-Law (B.L) qualification.
	Minimum of 3 years and maximum of 7 years post-call experience.
	Strong knowledge of corporate/commercial law, mining law, and regulatory compliance.
	Excellent drafting, negotiation, and communication skills.
	Proven ability to work independently and manage multiple priorities.
	High level of integrity, professionalism, and attention to detail.


What We Offer


	Competitive remuneration package.
	Opportunities for professional growth and development.
	A dynamic and supportive work environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qandidates candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: ganfenglithiumindustrylimited1@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Operations Analyst Job at Clearpay Microfinance Bank




        
    

        
        Clearpay is a LicenseMicro-Finance bank under the CBN regulations and has been in existence for about 5 years. The bank is duly incorprated and is insured under the NDIC program.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Operations Analyst

Job Location: Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Requirements
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications with 2-3 years of experience.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Emem.akpan@clearpaymfb.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
